name: Blast to Amass
description:
SYNOPSIS

Planet Earth is on the verge of extinction, and it is your job to find a new home for all of humanity. Luckily, the space program was able to locate planet NV-17, which is like earth, but not quite inhabitable. Through some terraforming of materials from other nearby space objects, you can make the planet become inhabitable.  However, you must be careful. As the planet grows more Aliens will discover you. Try to Push Away the Aliens and Pull Yourself Together to make a new home for humanity.

CREDITS

CyclopicSpider - Art

Mr_Afroduck - Programming

StraightUpGruntled - Programming

NateTheSoundNinja - Music and Sound
